Slash commands: /help, /quit, /clear, /status, /remote on|off, /retry, /plan, /mode <plan|build|auto>, /model <id>, /test [suite], /files [path], /models, /skills
! for bash • / for commands • @ for files • Tab to complete • Esc closes menus
USER      Apply patch
ASSISTANT diff --git a/foo.txt b/foo.txt
          index 1234567..89abcde 100644
          --- a/foo.txt
          +++ b/foo.txt
          @@ -1,6 +1,8 @@
          -old line 1
          +new line 1
          +new line 2
          … 4 lines hidden — Δ +5/-3 in foo.txt
          -tail old
          +tail new
          +tail extra
           end
